thread.title: Daniel Craciun

author: Daniel Craciun
title: Daniel Craciun
text:
Paid 15 euro after been offered a deal on driver updater tweakbit and my chappy computer with a fresh install of win7 didn't have not even sounds USB 2.0 not working and loads of other issues you always get with new install of windows
It works on any new or old pc or laptop and it works onine it finds the driver erst and installs and updates .easy peasy does the job for you make yourself a coffee and relax.trust me it is great
